cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_PORT_FOR_S1U to 99999 (exceeds maximum port number) will cause network configuration errors and prevent S1-U interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSlots to 20 (exceeds maximum allowed for the periodicity) will cause configuration validation failure and prevent TDD pattern setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofDownlinkSlots 設定為 20（超過週期允許的最大值）會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止 TDD 模式設定。
